programme.title: Already Tomorrow in Hong Kong
programme.desc: Ruby (Jamie Chung) and Josh (Bryan Greenberg) spent an unforgettable night together in Hong Kong a year ago, and now their brief encounter is about to get a second chance.

programme.title: Christmas Crush
programme.desc: When a woman learns of her high school reunion a week before Christmas, she's ecstatic to finally have her chance to win the one "that got away" back.

programme.desc: When Conrad is kicked out and cut off at the age of forty, he crashes with his only friend and falls in love with his friend�s girlfriend

programme.title: 12 Days of Christmas
programme.desc: During their first winter break from college, two childhood friends navigate turbulent reunions, unspoken romances, and even an unplanned pregnancy.

programme.title: I'll Be Homeless For Christmas
programme.desc: When a petty thief learns that his latest mark is a struggling single mother who works at a homeless shelter, he decides to use his savvy street smarts to make this Christmas one to remember for her and her young son.

programme.title: Christmas Survival
programme.desc: Sisters, Miranda (Gemma Whelan, "Game of Thrones") and Lyla (Joely Richardson) come together for Christmas in this heart-warming holiday comedy. However, ancient sibling rivalries flare-up to sabotage the hope for a season of good will.

programme.title: Christmas in The Heartland
programme.desc: Kara and Jessie strike up an unlikely friendship when seated next to each other on a plane headed to the heartland. With both girls visiting family they've never met, they devise a plan to switch places for Christmas.

programme.title: The Christmas Kid
programme.desc: A take on Home Alone British style where the main character is all grown up now.

programme.desc: After having a traumatizing holiday history, Sarah learns to love Christmas again.

programme.title: Dear Santa
programme.desc: Crystal comes from a wealthy family and loves spending her parent's money. When they decide it's time for her to make something of her life they give her until Christmas to clean up her act.
